description:
Colombia’s President Gustavo Petro called on people to verify if their phones showed traces of Israeli surveillance software Pegasus. In a tweet, Petro additionally urged people who participated in the…

The post Petro calls on Colombia to check phones for Pegasus spyware appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
title: Petro calls on Colombia to check phones for Pegasus spyware

description:
Almost 700 indigenous victims of Colombia’s armed conflict left the capital Bogota on Sunday to return to their lands in the west of the country. The trip from Bogota to…

title: Hundreds of victims of conflict in west Colombia return to indigenous lands
